新卡bottleneck at Pcie 3 會折幾多%呢

quote.msg: 新卡bottleneck at Pcie 3 會折幾多%呢

replies.msg:
Actually, the bottleneck is a synthetic cap by Intel to 22Gbps due to having 18Gbps reserved for DisplayPort output. See below in the end of the opi section: https://egpu.io/best-laptops-external-gpu/#opi

Basically, the enclosures themselves have to be capped so they can be certified by Intel. (I think they do this to allow daisy-chain that could theoretically happen with egpu enclosures still allowing for a display to be at the end of the chain, that could still be driven by the IGP)

But after that, there are further issues. First would be the bottleneck of the 4 (or worse 2) lanes of PCIe 3.0 (985MB/s times 4=3.94GB/s, or about 31.5Gbps), and as the previous comment says, the problem of controller latency when handling multiple peripherals going through a controller. And even after that, OPI mode and even PCH overhead will influence how an eGPU (and all connected peripherals to a particular enclosure) will be handled, usually worse when put in contrast to direct-to-cpu links such as an x16 PCIe connector or Aleienware's Amplifier which are directly hooked to the CPU.

replies.msg: 支那

NV產品管理總監Justin Walker近日在QA環節中談及了RTX 3080顯示卡執行遊戲時的表現，據Walker所言RTX 3080顯示卡能夠在全高預設的情況下，以4K解析度下以60-100FPS執行3A遊戲。

在QA環節中有人詢問Justin Walker：RTX 3080的的10GB顯示記憶體是否夠用。對此Justin回答：RTX 3080顯示卡的目標是在最高4K解析ㄉ物、全高預設的情況下，帶來出色的遊戲性能表現。

Walker還補充說，額外的顯示記憶體對於任何一款GPU來說肯定都是好的，但這會讓顯示卡的價格也因此上升，“所以我們需要找到一個合適的平衡點。
加入cart睇下會唔會減價

在QA環節中有人詢問Justin Walker：RTX 3080的的10GB顯示記憶體是否夠用。對此Justin回答：RTX 3080顯示卡的目標是在最高4K解析ㄉ物、全高預設的情況下，帶來出色的遊戲性能表現。

老黃已經端出了熱呼呼的RTX 30系顯卡大餐，可對於A陣營來說，則有些焦慮，Big Navi到底要到何時，水準又是如何？

來自國外的最新爆料稱，Big Navi顯卡將歸屬於Radeon RX 6000系列家族，旗艦型號對標RTX 3080，搭配的是16GB GDDR6/6X顯存，面向消費級暫時沒有HBM2版本。

價格方面，Big Navi原定599美元，可看到安培RTX發布後，AMD方面決定再降50美元，直接做到549美元起步，也就是比RTX 3080低了150美元之多。

從規格和性能上，Big Navi力壓RTX 3070，價格又比RTX 3080給力許多，這套反擊拳法在戰術上打得漂亮，更別說還有8GB版更親民的Big Navi呢。

去年，AMD副總裁兼Radeon業務總經理Scott Herkelman曾自豪RX 5700/5600 XT的市場策略，稱給NVIDIA的2060/2070造成很大壓力並打亂了其產品規劃。
